channel.title: Moparscape 3.2 / Aryan - shuts down shortly after runned
channel.description:
Hi,
I installed moparscape 3.2 and runned using Moparscape.jar. It opens normaly and says starting up... in a few seconds, it says Downloading file - 0% done.
It stays so for a long time, then it goes to 1% and finaly to 2%.
After that, without any error or anything, moparscape window shuts down and a DOS window is left open. It says: Press any key to continue...
I press a key but the only thing that happens is that the DOS windows shuts down too and nothing else.
This happens every time, I tryed using moparscape web client but same thing, when it shuts it also shuts down all the other browsers I got open.
Please help!
With regards,
Serizzim

item.title: Moparscape 3.2 / Aryan - shuts down shortly after runned
item.dc:creator: @Serizzim Serizzim
item.description:
@Serizzim wrote:

You probably got >JRE< 10

This is what I mean jre1.5.0_10.

If you got >JDK< 10 then please be so nice to post a link to it.

Anyway my problem is still not solved, please help, if it helps, this is in my java folder:

j2re1.4.2_13
jdk1.6.0
jre1.5.0_03
jre1.5.0_10

I am desperate, please, help me.

EDIT:

Here is what a error log inside my C:\WINDOWS.mpr_file_store_32 shows:

java.lang.InterruptedException: sleep interrupted
at java.lang.Thread.sleep(Native Method)
at ProgressChecker.run(Update.java:165)
tract the file to your c:/windows/.mpr_file_store_32/
folder. Then restart MoparScape.
Fatal error, exiting.
[br][size=1]Posted on: February 09, 2007, 09:16:27 AM[/size][hr]BUMP

Please help!

Read full topic
item.source: Moparscape 3.2 / Aryan - shuts down shortly after runned

item.title: Moparscape 3.2 / Aryan - shuts down shortly after runned
item.dc:creator: @Serizzim Serizzim
item.description:
@Serizzim wrote:

I am sorry but it says JDK 6 is latest on Sun Java’s website.[br][size=1]Posted on: February 09, 2007, 06:52:53 AM[/size][hr]Sorry for double posting but here is what happens now:

It closes as before but now in the console this is writen:

Downloading the 16mb cache file just once, please be patient.
Downloading c:/windows/.mpr_file_store_32/cache.zip…

Is there any way to download cache manualy?

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape 3.2 / Aryan - shuts down shortly after runned

item.description:
@Serizzim wrote:

“6” I think… I will download the latest JDK again though I think I already got it.

Read full topic
